title: Plugin: DOM interaction (click, fill, scroll)
description: Inject JS to click elements by ref, fill inputs, check/uncheck, select dropdowns, scroll. Uses ref IDs from snapshot.
close_reason: Click and fill with @ref and CSS selector support, scroll into view

title: [Epic] Claude Code Skill
description: SKILL.md for Claude Code integration. Documents all CLI commands with examples. Same pattern as agent-browser skill â€” short commands, ref-based targeting, workflow examples.
close_reason: Epic: SKILL.md and CLAUDE.md written

title: Remove permissive CORS
description: Replace CorsLayer::permissive() with no CORS or locked-down allowlist. CLI doesn't need CORS since it's not a browser.
close_reason: Closed

title: Plugin: HTTP+WS server with axum
description: Plugin init function that starts axum server on configurable port. WebSocket upgrade for streaming. Basic health check endpoint.
close_reason: Axum HTTP+WS server with routes, CORS, health check

title: Write SKILL.md for Claude Code
description: Document all commands with examples. Same structure as agent-browser skill. Quick start, core workflow, command reference, debugging section.
close_reason: SKILL.md with full command reference and workflow example

title: CLI: Backend commands (invoke, state, events, logs)
description: invoke cmd args, state dump, events emit/listen, logs streaming with --level filter. The differentiator vs agent-browser.
close_reason: CLI invoke, state, events, logs, windows commands implemented

title: Workspace setup: Cargo workspace with plugin + CLI crates
description: Set up Rust workspace with crates/tauri-plugin-debug-bridge and crates/tauri-browser. Add shared dependencies.
close_reason: Workspace with plugin + CLI crates compiling clean

title: Auth token for debug bridge
description: Add random per-run token (X-Debug-Bridge-Token header). Print token on startup, require CLI to pass it. Prevents malicious webpages from calling the debug bridge.
close_reason: Closed

title: CLI: Interaction commands (click, fill, run-js)
description: click @ref, fill @ref text, run-js expression. All use refs from snapshot. Output formatted for LLM.
close_reason: CLI click, fill, run-js commands with ref support

title: Plugin: Webview JS execution + screenshot
description: Endpoints for eval (run JS via WebviewWindow::eval), screenshot (capture webview as PNG), and DOM snapshot (inject accessibility tree walker script, return ref-based element list).
close_reason: Eval with IPC result channel, screenshot via canvas, DOM snapshot walker with refs

title: CLI: Arg parsing with clap + connect command
description: Main binary with clap. connect subcommand to establish HTTP/WS connection to debug bridge. Connection state management.
close_reason: Clap derive parser with all commands, subcommands, and output format

title: CLI: Snapshot + screenshot commands
description: snapshot -i for interactive elements with refs. snapshot -c for compact. screenshot to stdout or file. Full page support.
close_reason: CLI snapshot and screenshot commands wired to client

title: Add unit tests
description: 0 tests currently. Add tests for: looks_like_expression edge cases, CLI URL construction, output formatting.

title: Fix inconsistent Tauri JS bridge in backend.rs
description: webview.rs uses __TAURI_INTERNALS__.invoke but backend.rs uses window.__TAURI__.core.invoke which may not exist. Standardize on __TAURI_INTERNALS__.
close_reason: Closed

title: Fix missing routes: events/listen, logs, console, errors
description: CLI calls /events/listen (WS) but plugin never routes it. Logs/console/errors streaming are placeholders. Either implement or remove from CLI.

title: Plugin: Console + log streaming
description: Capture console.log/warn/error from webview via early JS injection. Capture Rust log/tracing output. Stream both over WebSocket with level filtering.
close_reason: WebSocket log and console streaming endpoints with placeholder

title: Plugin: Event system (emit, listen, list)
description: Emit Tauri events, list registered listeners, subscribe to events via WebSocket stream.
close_reason: Event emit and list endpoints working

title: Fix snapshot -i interactive filtering
description: CLI sends ?interactive=true but server ignores query params, always returns full tree. Server should filter to interactive-only elements when flag is set.
close_reason: Closed

title: [Epic] tauri-plugin-debug-bridge
description: Tauri plugin that exposes HTTP+WS debug server (port 9229). Provides webview JS execution, screenshots, DOM snapshots, invoke command proxying, state inspection, event system, and log streaming. Dev-only behind a feature flag.
close_reason: Epic: plugin crate structure complete

title: Plugin: Invoke command proxy + command listing
description: Endpoint to call any registered Tauri command by name with JSON args, returning the result. Also list all registered commands from generate_handler.
close_reason: Invoke proxy via webview JS, windows list, config endpoint

title: Align SKILL.md with actual implementation
description: Docs claim features that are placeholders (events listen, log streaming, interactive-only snapshots). Label unimplemented features as planned.

title: Plugin: State inspection + app introspection
description: Dump managed state (Debug trait). List windows/webviews. Return tauri.conf.json. Tray/menu structure dump.
close_reason: State placeholder, windows list, config endpoint implemented

title: Replace uuid_v4 with proper random IDs
description: Current uuid_v4() is timestamp-based, not random. Collision-prone under concurrency, can panic on time regression. Use rand or uuid crate.
close_reason: Closed

title: Fix server bind error handling
description: Port bind failure panics inside spawned task. Surface error cleanly via plugin setup or log loudly.
close_reason: Closed

title: Fix global mutex serializing all requests
description: Handlers hold Arc<Mutex<BridgeState>> across awaits, blocking all requests. Make BridgeState immutable with AppHandle cloned, only mutex the pending map.
close_reason: Closed

title: Add request body size limits
description: Add DefaultBodyLimit middleware to axum router. Endpoints accept arbitrary JSON strings with no size cap.
close_reason: Closed

title: [Epic] tauri-browser CLI
description: Rust CLI tool with agent-browser-style UX. Connects to debug bridge via HTTP/WS. Supports snapshot, click, fill, screenshot, invoke, state, events, logs commands. Ref-based element targeting. Output optimized for LLM consumption.
close_reason: Epic: CLI arg parsing + client + output formatting complete
